meanings.definition: A loudspeaker system used for making announcements in public places.
meanings.sent1: The tannoy in the train station announced the arrival of the next train.
meanings.sent2: The tannoy at the airport informed passengers about the boarding time.
meanings.sent3: The tannoy in the park suddenly started playing music instead of announcements.
meanings.sent4: The tannoy's voice echoed through the stadium, commanding attention from the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The tannoy's crackling sound made it hard to understand the message being broadcast.

meanings.definition: To make an announcement over a loudspeaker system.
meanings.sent1: The principal will tannoy the school-wide assembly schedule tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Please tannoy the message about the meeting time to all employees.
meanings.sent3: He decided to tannoy his love for pizza to the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The politician tannoyed promises of change to the eager crowd.
meanings.sent5: The coach tannoyed instructions to the team, boosting their morale.
